alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 4:28PM CDT until June 11 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Woodruff County in eastern Arkansas... Southeastern Jackson County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 427 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Algoa, or 9 miles south of Newport, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo... Algoa... McFadden... Beedeville... Weldon... Balch... Blackville... Shoffner... Erwin... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
